title: Version includes API calls and NLU analysis

comments.bodyText: I am having problems with importing Cloudant. Do I have to download anything?

comments.bodyText:
Hi! Daniel and I are in the glassrooms, you can join us.
For the issue, did you download ibmcloudant using pip? Looks like it lacks this module.

comments.author: yvah
comments.bodyText:
IBM credentials might have changed if someone of the team reseted them, but it seems like you just don’t have the file with them. Try to reinstall cloudant using pip:
pip uninstall cloudant
pip install cloudant
